data.title: Systems Design
data.description: Arrange and Connect the Elements of Success

tab.title: Overview
markdown: There is a reason you’ll hear the word “integration” used all too often in reference to the digital industry. Those who still think of a website as a discrete entity must re-envision their company’s online presence as an ecosystem of fluid, interdependent components: applications, widgets, 3rd party software, active databases…all necessary to providing the user experience your customers demand.
A specialty food company had a Chinese site used primarily for B2B operations, but wanted to upgrade for improved B2B lead generation and B2C sales.
